Headline: #57 Laramie Temporary Northbound Reroute near Grand/Laramie
ShortDescription: Northbound 57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted via Laramie, Grand, Cicero, North and Laramie over regular route due to street blockage near Grand/Laramie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted via Laramie, Grand, Cicero, North and Laramie over regular route due to street blockage near Grand/Laramie

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #73 Armitage Temporary Westbound Reroute near Grand/Laramie
ShortDescription: Westbound 73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted via Armitage, Grand, Laramie, North Ave & Cicero, due to street blockage near Grand/Laramie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted via Armitage, Grand, Laramie, North Ave & Cicero, due to street blockage near Grand/Laramie.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed near Monroe
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Monroe due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Monroe due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service.

Allow extra travel time.
